getmedia.SavedMedia¶

class SavedMedia¶

Bases: getmedia.Media

Download and maintain media.

Works with Youtube, Twitter and Instagram

Parameters

permFolder (string) – Absolute path where media will be downloaded in OS

__init__()¶

Construct method.

Methods

deleteMedia(cmd)¶

Delete saved media related to command.

Parameters

cmd (string) – Keyword related with saved media

Returns

Deleted titles of media related to command

dlIG(path, url)¶

Download Instagram media from given URL and save to given Path.

Parameters

  • path (string) – Path for the file to be saved

  • url (string) – URL of the media to be downloaded

dlYT(path, url)¶

Download Youtube and Twitter media from given URL and save to given Path.

Parameters

  • path (string) – Path for the file to be saved

  • url (string) – URL of the media to be downloaded

processMedia(pathYT, pathIG, *url)¶

Input URLs to respected methods and save them in given paths.

Parameters

  • pathYT (string) – Download path of Youtube and Twitter URLs

  • pathIG (string) – Download path of Instagram URLs

  • url (List of string) – Variable length argument list of URLs

saveMedia(cmd, *url)¶

Abstract class functionality to permanently download media in one command.

Parameters

  • cmd (string) – Keyword related with saved media

  • url (List of string) – Variable length argument list of URLs

Returns

Titles of saved media

Return type

List of strings
